page.title: 16RECREATION (West Block)
page.content: The sample used for a Leisure Survey reflected the age structure of the area.30% under 16 years,60% in working age groups,10% retired.Watching television dominated every age group (14% of leisure time spent by most groups,but 39% of over 60s in winter). { Under 15 years}records & tapes (11% of time) active outdoor sports and computers are main leisure pursuits. { 16-30 years}TV,records,seaside (summer) and personal care. { 31-40 years}Cooking (8-11% of time), TV,seaside visits,and book reading. { 41-60 years}TV,and active outdoor sports all year round,gardening in summer,and book reading in winter. { Over 60 years}TV and reading magazines all year round,Gardening in summer,and Do-It-Yourself hobbies in the winter.
